thread.title: Susie Byrne
thread.title_full: School Stream - School Communication App reviewed by Susie Byrne

author: Susie Byrne
title: Susie Byrne
text: Schoolstream has connnected our families with our centre. By providing: a) ease of communication with our working families who do not visit our centre; b) it is another resource for families learning to speak and read english; c)a means of communication to non-english speaking family members; d) has provided an opportunity for the children to communicate within their family about their day. It has also reduced our paper trail considerably which is good for the environment. It is convenient, have had positive feedback from families and easy to use. Shame we did not know about Schoolstream sooner.
